class MyApp extends StatelessWidget {
    @override
    Widget build(BuildContext context) {
        return MaterialApp(
            title: '测试程序',
            debugShowCheckedModeBanner: false, // 去掉右上角的debug标签
            theme: ThemeData(
            primarySwatch: Colors.blue,
            ),
        home: MyHomePage(title: "测试程序"),
        );
    }
}
